content: the highland throw pillow is the perfect home decor accessory to add cozy warmth to any room in the house the crochet alpine stitch is the star of the show and creates a beautiful surface texture that just begs to be touched the look and feel of your highland throw pillow is ideal for the cold winter months and a companion piece for the fireside throw blanket made with lion brand s pound of love in antique white the pillow is soft to the touch with beautiful stitch definition you can make your highland throw pillow with any worsted weight yarn that coordinates with your room decor for a finished look **skill level** confident beginner *written in english using us crochet terminology* **yarn** approx 4 oz of any worsted weight yarn **hook** us size h-8 5mm **tools + materials** 16 poly-fil pillow form removable stitch markers tapestry needle for weaving in ends the pattern pdf includes a crochet chart for stitch placement
